quote: For one crazy moment he had the notion of a vanished tribe of librarians, lost in the deep underground caverns of the Bodleian, a wild and savage tribe that fed on unwary travellers.
quote_letters: FOR ONE CRAZY MOMENT HE HAD THE NOTION OF A VANISHED TRIBE OF LIBRARIANS LOST IN THE DEEP UNDERGROUND CAVERNS OF THE BODLEIAN A WILD AND SAVAGE TRIBE THAT FED ON UNWARY TRAVELLERS
